physical_examinations.relevant_findings: The proband exhibited muscle cramping and tetany. Additionally, bilateral subcapsular cataracts were noted.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Serum calcium levels ranged from 5.3 to 6.9 mg/dL over time with episodes of therapy discontinuation.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: The proband developed hypocalcemia due to hypoparathyroidism and underwent surgical repair of a cardiac defect.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Asymptomatic hypocalcemia was diagnosed in the proband's mother and grandmother retrospectively.
